tool_plan.objective: Determine one choice to recommend (ex-post blind) for the Aave proposal 0xa2b9d0717a82a111acc27e514bed07caa9b8636c12dd68fb61ae4dc57503c3cd, using full votes analysis, timeline analysis, and on-chain holder distribution and concentration metrics.

calls.why: To obtain authoritative proposal metadata including start and end times for timeline analysis.
To analyze voting timeline and participation metrics based on votes and proposal times.
To compute total holders and top-100 holder distribution/concentration metrics for on-chain context of the proposal.

tool_plan.notes: Used the provided votes sample and proposal info to set timeline parameters. On-chain analysis will provide concentration insights to support the recommendation.

decision.summary: The proposal to deploy Aave v3 on Plasma is supported based on detailed technical and risk analyses from governance discussion and expert reviews. While on-chain votes and holder metrics are unavailable, community sentiment and risk providers favor proceeding with the deployment with continued monitoring.
key_arguments_for: Plasma offers a high-performance, scalable, and secure blockchain optimized for stablecoins with zero fees and fast transactions.
Risk assessments by LlamaRisk and ChaosLabs indicate no immediate blockers, with the network progressing to mainnet launch and positive testnet activity.
Governance discussion shows community and expert support for the deployment pending ongoing evaluation.
The proposal includes thorough risk parameter specifications for supported assets and plans for conservative activation caps.
key_arguments_against: Plasma is a novel network with limited live mainnet data and some technical risks due to its early development stage.
Audit and security details are still being finalized; some infrastructure components are not yet audited or publicly available.
On-chain data and liquidity profiles are not fully established, leading to uncertainty in market impact and token volatility.
Governance votes and on-chain holder distribution metrics were unavailable, limiting full ex-post analysis.

evidence.quote: [ARFC] Deploy Aave v3 on Plasma with choices: YAE, NAY, Abstain; start and end timestamps
LlamaRisk and ChaosLabs provide risk assessment and recommend proceeding with deployment pending further monitoring; community discussion supports the proposal.

decision.simulation_reason: Insufficient vote and on-chain data for full ex-post simulation; decision based on proposal metadata and governance discussion.

references.description: Governance discussion thread with risk assessments and community opinions
